sourcesContent:
// src/components/ProjectList.jsx import React from 'react'; const ProjectList = () => { const projects = [ { title: "Project Title 1", timeframe: "2023-2025", grant: "€200,000", funding: "FCT - Portuguese Foundation for Science and Technology", reference: "PTDC/123/456/2023", role: "Principal Investigator", objective: "Brief description of the project's main objective. This can be a longer text explaining the key goals and expected outcomes of the research project." }, { title: "Project Title 2", timeframe: "2021-2024", grant: "€150,000", funding: "European Union - Horizon 2020", reference: "H2020-789-2021", role: "Researcher", objective: "Project objective description goes here. Explaining the main research goals and methodologies used." }, // Add more projects... ]; return (

Research Projects

    {projects.map((project, index) => (

  1. {project.title}

    Period: {project.timeframe}
    Funding: {project.grant}
    Role: {project.role}
    Reference: {project.reference}
    Agency: {project.funding}
    Objective:

    {project.objective}

    2. ))}
); }; export default ProjectList;
